quote: None of you truly believes until he loves for his brother what he loves for himself.
I am my beloved's, and my beloved is mine.
Love conquers all; let us also yield to love.
Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none.
Whoever is touched by love becomes a poet.
Love is the water of life. Drink it down with heart and soul!
Your task is not to seek for love, but to seek and find all the barriers within yourself that you have built against it.
I belong to no religion. My religion is love.
Let the beauty of what you love be what you do.
If their love can last for an age, why need they stay together day and night?
Till mountains crumble, till rivers run dry… Not till then will my love die.
Love is patient, love is kind… It always protects, always trusts, always hopes, always perseveres.
Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
Whatever our souls are made of, his and mine are the same.
My bounty is as boundless as the sea, my love as deep.
How do I love thee? Let me count the ways.
Love gives naught but itself and takes naught but from itself.
Where there is love, there is life.
Love that moves the sun and the other stars.
Love is the joy of the good, the wonder of the wise, the amazement of the gods.
O my Luve's like a red, red rose that’s newly sprung in June.
Love does not consist in gazing at each other, but in looking outward together in the same direction.
Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
If I know what love is, it is because of you.
We accept the love we think we deserve.
Life without love is like a tree without blossoms or fruit.
To love and be loved is to feel the sun from both sides.
Where there is great love, there are always miracles.
There is no remedy for love but to love more.
It is better to have loved and lost than never to have loved at all.
The only thing we never get enough of is love; the only thing we never give enough of is love.
Who, being loved, is poor?
I love you without knowing how, or when, or from where.
Love understands love; it needs no talk.
Love is the only force capable of transforming an enemy into a friend.
All you need is love.
Love is an act of endless forgiveness.
Love is the symbol of eternity. It wipes out all sense of time.
In your light I learn how to love.
You are the finest, loveliest, tenderest, and most beautiful person I have ever known.
I would rather spend one lifetime with you, than face all the ages of this world alone.
The best love is the kind that awakens the soul and makes us reach for more.
Love is a friendship set to music.
Love is the only gold.
The minute I heard my first love story I started looking for you.
True love stories never have endings.
To love another person is to see the face of God.
Love is a promise, love is a souvenir, once given never forgotten.
I wish you to know that you have been the last dream of my soul.
Love is the poetry of the senses.
Love is a canvas furnished by nature and embroidered by imagination.
Love is the greatest refreshment in life.
Love is the only reality, and it is not a mere sentiment.
Love is when the other person's happiness is more important than your own.
Love is a better teacher than duty.
Love is the magician that pulls man out of his own hat.
Love is the master key that opens the gates of happiness.
Love is the beauty of the soul.
He seems to me equal to gods that man who sits opposite you and listens to your sweet voice.
Love does not dominate; it cultivates.
There is always some madness in love. But there is also always some reason in madness.
Even after all this time the sun never says to the earth, 'You owe me.' Look what happens with a love like that—it lights the whole sky.
Love one another, but make not a bond of love: let it rather be a moving sea between the shores of your souls.
When love beckons to you, follow it.
For thy sweet love remembered such wealth brings That then I scorn to change my state with kings.
My heart is ever at your service.
Who loves, teaches.
At the touch of love everyone becomes a poet.
Spread love everywhere you go. Let no one ever come to you without leaving happier.
Love is like the wind, you can't see it but you can feel it.
In love nothing exists between heart and heart.
What the heart has once owned and had, it shall never lose.
Love cures people—both the ones who give it and the ones who receive it.
To love is nothing. To be loved is something. But to love and be loved, that’s everything.
Love is not only something you feel, it is something you do.
Love is the only sane and satisfactory answer to the problem of human existence.
Love is the voice under all silences, the hope which has no opposite in fear.
Love is the whole thing. We are only pieces.
The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
You don’t love someone for their looks, or their clothes, or for their fancy car, but because they sing a song only you can hear.
Love is like a friendship caught on fire.
The art of love is largely the art of persistence.
Love is the triumph of imagination over intelligence.
We are shaped and fashioned by what we love.
Love is the flower of life, and blossoms unexpectedly and without law.
Love is an endless act of faith. Be faithful.
Love is the only light that can truly read the secret signature of another’s soul.
Love is the emblem of eternity; it confounds all notion of time.
Love is the greatest of dreams, yet the hardest to come by.
To love is to receive a glimpse of heaven.
Love is the only way to grasp another human being in the innermost core of their personality.
Love is the master key that opens the gates of happiness.
Love is the foundation of all existence.
